item.title: Automated Case Tracking System
item.description: window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || []; function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);} gtag('js', new Date()); gtag('config', 'UA-135442428-1'); Automated Case Tracking System ACTS The Automated Case Tracking System Office Automation Consultants Inc. developed its flagship product, the Automated Case Tracking System (ACTS), to serve as a flexible framework to manage all types of data in a variety of different environments. The ACTS can be customized to suite the needs of any public or private agencies.
